io.atomix.catalyst.transport

Interface Transport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalTransport, NettyTransport

    public interface Transport
    Transport provider.

    This is a low level abstraction that serves to provide Catalyst clients and servers with Client and Server instances. Throughout the lifetime of a Transport, Catalyst may call on the transport to create multiple Client and Server objects.

    When the Transport is closed, it should close all Client and Server instances created by it if they're not already closed.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Client client()
      Creates a new transport client.
      Server server()
      Creates a new transport server.
